SEARCH
Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context

Class ContextualPlayChannel<C,P>

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context.ContextualPlayChannel<C,P>
Type Parameters:
C - the type of context this channel has.
P - the type of payload this channel sends and receives.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Channel, PlayChannel
public class ContextualPlayChannel<C,P> extends Object implements PlayChannel
Describes a channel that sends and receives contextual payloads.

Note: Payloads to not have to extend ContextualPlayChannel<C,P>.com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context.ContextualPlayChannel.Payload.

      Creates a new contextual channel that accepts a RegistryNetByteBuf codec or NetByteBuf codec.
      Type Parameters:
      C - the context type.
      P - the payload type.
      Parameters:
      id - the name of the channel.
      channelContext - the context of the channel.
      codec - the channel's payload codec.
      Returns:

    • isToServer

      public boolean isToServer()
      Description copied from interface: Channel
      Gets whether this channel receives payloads on the server.

      Note: channels can receive on both server and client.
